page.title: 20Acknowledgements.
page.content: The writing of the text, the photo- -graphy & all the research for this 'block' has been carried out by{Mrs. {Glynis Wilsdon,}with the help of Andrew (3) & Christopher (1). Glynis Wilsdon would like to record her grateful thanks to the following people for their part in this nationwide Domesday project:- Hart District Council,Winchfield Parish Council,Hampshire County Council (M3, Library & Educ.Depts), Fleet Service Station, Local Headteachers, Hampshire Constabulary, British Rail, Alder Val- -ley Bus Co.,The farmers who completed the farm questionnaire & the numerous local people who were interviewed. Thank-you also to Maurice Wilsdon for his co-operation & to Jane & Andrew Bonnin who gave the authoress access to their computer, especially to Jane who typed in much of the text.
